name: Join Ed
description:
The deep depths of the dungeon hides a secret. Only one brave Wizard can find the true treasure. However, the way is dangerous; they are many enemies and traps waiting for the brave heroes to fall.

Join Ed the Wizard in his descent, where you will face the true face of the dungeon. Despite the fact that Ed is strong and intelligent, he lacks the power to attack. The only thing Ed can do is taking control of the other enemies by controlling their minds. However, he controls them with his own movement. So be careful, when someone joins the Ed.

Controls:

- Movement: W A S D or arrow keys. 

- Making enemy join Ed: just walk into them!
